animeDescription: Jinguuji Miko and her male assistant Kanda Rokuro hunt phantoms together. The phantoms invade peoples bodies and control them. Trained as a skilled Phantom Hunter Miko must use exorcism to send the phantoms back to where ever they came from.
animeStaff: [['Furuhashi Kazuhiro', ['Director']], ['Sokuza Makoto', ['Episode Director']], ['Sekiya Yoshihiro', ['Director of Photography']], ['Katahira Shinji', ['Art Director']]]
